headline: Is NRG (NRG) a Buy as Wall Street Analysts Look Optimistic?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), NRG (NRG) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
